title: OK Jaanu
short_cast: Aditya Roy Kapur, Shraddha Kapoor, Leela Samson, Naseeruddin Shah, Kitu Gidwani, Prahlad Kakkar, Vijayant Kohli, Sarika Singh
cast: Aditya Roy Kapur, Shraddha Kapoor, Leela Samson, Naseeruddin Shah, Kitu Gidwani, Prahlad Kakkar, Vijayant Kohli, Sarika Singh

desc: A marriage-averse duo decides to cohabitate until their careers send them to different countries. The plan seems logical — until real love develops.
